revised_title: Observations on the Lifetime of the Neutral Meson and its Modes of Decay
tldr: The authors conducted experiments to determine the mean lifetime of the neutral meson by observing direct electron pairs associated with nuclear disintegrations and an alternative mode of decay. They found that the ratio of the probability of this alternative mode of decay to the transformation into two photons is 1. This discovery provided strong evidence for the mode of origin of the mesons and allowed for a direct method to determine their lifetime.
